com.epam.labs.dao

Class UserDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epam.labs.dao.AbstractDAO<User>
      • com.epam.labs.dao.UserDAO

  • public class UserDAO
extends AbstractDAO<User>
    Class to implement all necessary methods to database access for car entity
